thread.title: Ivy’s Agency Confirms She And Go Eun Sung Have Gotten Back Together
thread.title_full: Ivy’s Agency Confirms She And Go Eun Sung Have Gotten Back Together

author: miguksan
title: Ivy’s Agency Confirms She And Go Eun Sung Have Gotten Back Together
text:
Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Singer Ivy and musical actor Go Eun Sung have officially gotten back together after their public break-up in early February. 
On March 17, Ivy’s agency Polaris Entertainment broke the news through Herald POP: “Ivy and Go Eun Sung are currently back together after their split. Because it involves their personal lives, it is difficult to comment on it further.” 
Go Eun Sung’s agency also addressed the rumors surrounding their relationship earlier that day. However, they took a much more cautious stance, simply stating that “it is difficult to confirm facts about someone’s personal life.” 
The couple, who first met when performing in the musical “Wicked,” were reported to have split in early February, reportedly due to their busy schedules.
